attributes.action: Abolish TV Licence Fees For Everyone
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC is considered by many as not an unbiased organisation and, furthermore, ideologically captured. Taking the decision to not call Hamas a terrorist organisation - one that is responsible for beheading babies - and requiring citizens to pay a licence fee by force to such an organisation is unconscionable.  

I think it's time to allow citizens to remove support for such an organisation.
attributes.background: Create a bill to repeal laws requiring and enforcing citizens to pay a license including section 363 of the Communications Act 2003.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open on this topic:

Cancel the BBC license fee and shut down the BBC
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641007
